title: Ghostbusters, Volume 2: The Most Magical Place On Earth
description: The smash-hit ongoing series continues in this second story arc Thanks to the contract they signed, the Ghostbusters are temporarily barred by Walter Peck from taking any work (without his express permission) in New York City. The Ghostbusters skirt the edict by taking a job in Schenectady. It's a simple haunted amusement park upstate - what could possibly go wrong? Plus, a new short story only available in this collection. Collects issues 5-8.
author: Erik Burnham
